div.div: Κλυταιμνήστρη : daughter of Tyndareus, sister of Helen, and wife of Agamemnon. She was slain at the same time that her paramour Aegisthus was killed by Orestes, Il. 1.113, Od. 3.266, 310, Od. 11.439. (See cut No. 33.)
From A Homeric Dictionary (Georg Autenrieth, New York, Harper and Brothers, 1891)
